snippet: In court papers filed on Tuesday, lawyers for the Beastie Boys said that a popular online video that was created by the toy company, GoldieBlox, and contained an alternate version of the band’s song “Girls,” turned the band’s music into “a...
abstract: In court papers filed on Tuesday, lawyers for the Beastie Boys said that a popular online video that was created by the toy company, GoldieBlox, and contained an alternate version of the band’s song “Girls,” turned the band’s music into “a ‘jingle.’

headline.main: Beastie Boys Continue Copyright Battle With Toy Company
headline.print_headline: Beastie Boys Go to Court Against Toy Company
